attributes.action: take steps to make all MPs re-imbursements (including salaries) means tested.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just as many benefits are theoretically available to the general public but are given only to those judged to "need" them, so should money from the public purse only be given to members of parliament who actually need it. Independant body establishes criteria for means test and investigates data submitted by claimants. Any cheating equals "benefit fraud".

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
